talents.name: Skilled Picker
talents.desc: Increased yield from harvesting by hand

talents.name: Wood Breakdown
talents.desc: Unlocks the ability to turn wood into sticks

talents.name: Waste Not
talents.desc: Receive stone in addition to resources when mining ore deposits

talents.name: Exotic Power
talents.desc: Reduces exotics weight in your inventory

talents.name: Movin' Wood
talents.desc: Decreases wood weight in your inventory

talents.name: Slinging Stone
talents.desc: Decreases stone weight in your inventory

talents.name: Unburdened
talents.desc: Decreased ore weight in your inventory

talents.name: Exotic Sprinter
talents.desc: Increased movespeed with exotics in your inventory

talents.name: Seasoned Logsman
talents.desc: Chopped wood is automatically added to your inventory

talents.name: Peerless Lumberjack
talents.desc: Chance to instantly chop up a tree

talents.name: Lucky Strike
talents.desc: Chance to mine a deposit in one hit

talents.name: Strong Shoulders
talents.desc: Increased movespeed when carrying animal corpses

talents.name: Leather Breakdown
talents.desc: Unlocks the ability to turn leather into rope

talents.name: Quick Getaway
talents.desc: Increased stamina regen after taking damage

talents.name: Without a Sound
talents.desc: Harder to detect when in stealth

talents.name: Sense Small Animals
talents.desc: Nearby small animals will highlight when aiming

talents.name: Blueprint: Ghillie Armor
talents.desc: Grants access to Ghillie Armor blueprints

talents.name: Sense Medium Animals
talents.desc: Nearby medium animals will highlight when aiming

talents.name: Big Game Hunter
talents.desc: Allows you to see the location of World Bosses on the map

talents.name: Sense Megafauna
talents.desc: Nearby large animal will highlight when aiming

talents.name: Blueprint: Arctic Armor
talents.desc: Grants access to Arctic Armor blueprints

talents.name: Naturally Preserved
talents.desc: Slows food decay in your inventory

talents.name: Filling Meals
talents.desc: Eating refills hunger bar more rapidly

talents.name: Well Laid Fire
talents.desc: Crafted campfires consume fuel more slowly

talents.name: All-Nighter
talents.desc: Planted crops grow faster at night.

talents.name: Carnivore
talents.desc: Buffs from Dried Meat are Increased

talents.name: Shoot the Breeze
talents.desc: Grants the recipe to make gunpowder from fertilizer on the Mortar and Pestle

talents.name: Vegetarian
talents.desc: Buffs from Vegetable only foods are increased

talents.name: Get Off My Lawn
talents.desc: Grants the recipe to make the Rusty Shotgun on the Machining Bench

talents.name: Gathering Guru
talents.desc: Increased yield from harvesting by hand

talents.name: You Gonna Eat That?
talents.desc: Gain the ability to eat spoiled food

talents.name: Fresh Is Best
talents.desc: Planted crops do not Wither away after they have finished growing.

talents.name: Food Pyramid
talents.desc: Gives an extra active food buff

talents.name: Sturdy Stalks
talents.desc: Planted crops spoil slower when harvested

talents.name: Calming Presence
talents.desc: Reduces oxygen consumption for allies within 20m

talents.name: And Some For Me
talents.desc: Reviving a player also regenerates your health

talents.name: Cutting It Close
talents.desc: Increased movespeed in a drop's final 15 minutes

talents.name: Like It With The Lights Off
talents.desc: Hunger, thirst and oxygen drain much more slowly at night

talents.name: Cushioned Fall
talents.desc: Reduced chance of sprain from fall damage

talents.name: Forest Master
talents.desc: Increased health regen and movespeed in Forest biomes

talents.name: Arctic Master
talents.desc: Increased cold resistance and movespeed in Arctic biomes

talents.name: Makes The Dream Work
talents.desc: Increased shared XP from party members

talents.name: Desert Master
talents.desc: Decreased thirst and movespeed in Desert Biomes

talents.name: Well Cared For
talents.desc: Reduced crafting cost of taming equipment

talents.name: Efficient Feeding
talents.desc: Tamed creatures need less food and water

talents.name: Energetic Encouragement
talents.desc: Tamed creatures have faster stamina regeneration amd require less sleep when tamed

talents.name: Hardy Diet
talents.desc: Increase tamed creature health and health regeneration

talents.name: Relaxed Rider
talents.desc: Decreased oxygen, food and water costs while riding

talents.name: Act Natural
talents.desc: Reduced tamed creature threat and threat while riding

talents.name: (Still) One With Nature
talents.desc: Juvenile creatures are not attacked by hostile wildlife

talents.name: Easy Draw
talents.desc: Reduced stamina usage when drawing bows

talents.name: Increased Arrow Damage I
talents.desc: Adds a bonus to arrow damage

talents.name: Increased Arrow Damage II
talents.desc: Adds a further bonus to arrow damage

talents.name: Crafty Fletcher
talents.desc: Chance to craft double when crafting arrows

talents.name: Soft Spot I
talents.desc: Increased critical hit multiplier on bows

talents.name: Soft Spot II
talents.desc: Increased critical hit multiplier on bows

talents.name: Wounding Shot
talents.desc: Arrow strikes bleed your target over time

talents.name: Supply and Demand
talents.desc: Increased damage from crafted arrows or bolts

talents.name: Homing Instinct
talents.desc: Chance for arrows to find targets more easily

talents.name: Pinning Shot
talents.desc: Chance for arrow strikes to immobilize target
